channel.title: practice on CCOnline
channel.description: Recent content in practice on CCOnline

item.title: 2020 08 20 Best Practices
item.description: We had an improvisational Facebook-messenger call of Naoto in Bielefeld, Germany and Jorge and Matthjis at Performing Arts Forum.

item.title: 2020 08 06 Best Practices
item.description: 30 minutes of Naoto’s solo on blue background, followed by an improvisational Facebook-messenger call of Naoto in Cologne and Jorge and Matthjis at Performing Arts Forum.

item.title: 2020 08 05 Best Practices (Hydra Workshop)
item.description: Naoto in Cologne gave an informal Hydra workshop for Jorge and Matthijs at Performing Arts Forum.

item.title: Best Practices in Contemporary Dance
item.description: I started “Best Practices in Contemporary Dance” sessions with Jorge Guevara, based on an idea that emerged from the weekly “Choreographic Coding Online (CCOnline)” session.

item.title: 2020 07 30 Best Practices
item.description: An improvisational session on Facebook messenger, then on LiveLab between Naoto in Cologne and Jorge and Matthijs at Performing Arts Forum was recorded on July 30th.

item.title: 2020 07 23 Best Practices
item.description: Jorge and Matthijs in Performing Arts Forum joined Naoto in Cologne, after 10 minute of Naoto’s meditative session.

item.title: 2020 07 17 Best Practices
item.description: An improvisational session on LiveLab between Naoto in Cologne and Jorge and Matthijs at Performing Arts Forum was recorded on July 17th.

item.title: 2020 07 08 Best Practices
item.description: An improvisational session on LiveLab between Naoto in Cologne and Jorge and Matthijs at Performing Arts Forum was recorded on July 8th.

item.title: Studio 303 Residency
item.description: A practice with Nien Tzu Weng.

item.title: EEG Experiments
item.description: How can digital media intervene communications between humans in a non-cognitive domain rather than simply being “intelligent” technologies?
